org.pikater.core.agents.experiment.recommend

Class Agent_Recommender

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.core.Agent
      • org.pikater.core.agents.PikaterAgent
        • org.pikater.core.agents.experiment.Agent_AbstractExperiment
          • org.pikater.core.agents.experiment.recommend.Agent_Recommender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jade.core.TimerListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Agent_Basic, Agent_NMTopRecommender

    public abstract class Agent_Recommender
extends Agent_AbstractExperiment
    The base class for all recommender agents. Provides the basic interface and setup.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        protected double d(double v1,
       double v2,
       double min,
       double max)
        Computes the distance between two double values scaled to 0-1 by using the min and max values.
        Parameters:
        v1 - The first value
        v2 - The second value
        min - Minimum possible value for the first two parameters
        max - Maximum possible value for the first two parameters
        Returns:
        The distance between v1 and v2 mapped to the 0-1 interval.

      • dCategory

        protected int dCategory(java.lang.String v1,
            java.lang.String v2)
        Computes distance between categories. It is 0 in case both the categories are the same and 1 otherwise.
        Parameters:
        v1 - The first category
        v2 - The second category
        Returns:
        The distance between the categories

        protected int dBoolean(java.lang.Boolean v1,

        v2 - The second value
